segments.text: Hi , Sandra . how was your weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I went hiking in the mountains on Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really good ! you should try it sometime .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might . what did you do yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Uh , nothing much , just went to bed early . I was still tired from Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2
